parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power while driving, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The console lights blink
the navigation system screen turns on and off
the speedometer and RPM gauges go crazy
the internal lights flicker
and the electrical system dies while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the HFL module can cause the battery to drain, leading to the vehicle not starting, and leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The battery drains frequently
the vehicle won't start
the HFL module constantly drains the battery even when the vehicle is not in use.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The battery drainage issues can cause the vehicle to not start, leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The battery drains frequently
the vehicle won't start
the battery needs to be replaced multiple times.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Vehicle Stability Assist (VSA) and Brake System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the VSA and brake system can cause the vehicle to lose power and hesitate to accelerate, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power
the accelerator pedal is depressed but the vehicle hesitates to accelerate
the VSA
TCS
ABS
and VTM warning lights appear on the message board.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine compartment fires can cause significant damage to the vehicle, potentially leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The engine catches fire while the vehicle is parked
with no warning signs or symptoms.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The hood latch and flexibility issues can cause the hood to open while driving, obstructing the driver's view and potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The hood vibrates or flutters while driving
the hood latch moves back and forth easily
the hood flexes when opened and pulled.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The spontaneous window breakage can cause injuries or fatalities, especially if the broken glass shatters and enters the passenger compartment.
symptoms: The window glass breaks suddenly
without any apparent reason or warning signs.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The spare tire cable weld failure can cause the spare tire to become loose and potentially fall off while driving, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: A loud banging noise is heard from the rear of the vehicle
the spare tire cable weld is hanging underneath the rear end of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Premature Failure of Rear Shocks in MDX with Sport Suspension
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature failure of rear shocks can lead to a loss of vehicle control, accidents, and costly repairs.
symptoms: Rear shocks fail prematurely
causing a loss of vehicle stability and control.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure of ADS (Auto Damper System) Sensor
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ADS sensor can cause the system to malfunction, leading to a loss of vehicle control, accidents, and costly repairs.
symptoms: ADS light comes on
sensor corrosion
strut failure
and a clicking noise from the front suspension area.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Design Flaw in ADS System and Struts
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design flaw in the ADS system and struts can cause corrosion, leading to premature failure, loss of vehicle control, and accidents.
symptoms: ADS light comes on
sensor corrosion
strut failure
and a clicking noise from the front suspension area.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag system can lead to the failure of airbags to deploy in the event of an accident, resulting in increased risk of injury or death to occupants. Additionally, false warnings or errors can cause unnecessary stress and distraction to drivers.
symptoms: The "Check Air Bag System" warning light comes on without any apparent reason
airbags fail to deploy in the event of an accident
abnormal noises coming from the airbag system
airbag system warning message appears on the dashboard.
